name: CICD | FUNC | (MS Teams) Manage User Role Assignment
description: When there is a function call, do action and other actions

block.name: post_blocks_message
block.description: Post message to user as Workbot

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Merge Incoming Data

input.code:
data = workato.parse_json(input['data'])
merged_data = data.except("command","param1","param2","replace_message").to_json
merge_data = workato.parse_json(input['merge_data'])
if data.present? && merge_data.present?
  merged_data = data.merge(merge_data).except("command","param1","param2","replace_message").to_json
end

{
  merged_data: merged_data
}
input.name: Merge Incoming Data
